member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi
member.summary: Abstract class defining the base methods for server API classes

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi._restClient
member.summary: REST client to used for server requests

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi.API_VERSION_1_2
member.summary: HTTP Accept header for Card Services REST API v1.2

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi.API_VERSION_1_3
member.summary: HTTP Accept header for Card Services REST API v1.3

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi.#ctor(RestSharp.RestClient)
member.summary: Constructs and initializes the class with the given REST client

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi.CreateRequest(RestSharp.Method,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and initialize a REST Request instance

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi.ExecuteRequest``1(RestSharp.IRestRequest,System.String)
member.summary: Parametrized method for performing a server REST request. The method calls the server API and interprets the server response. On success, the server response is deserialized and returned as an instance of the specified response type. On error, an exception is thrown with the available error details.
member.typeparam: Class type for the server response
member.param: Error message describing the REST method

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.BaseServiceApi.CreateException(RestSharp.IRestResponse,System.String)
member.summary: Creates and returns a CardServicesApiException for the given server error response. The exception is created from the json formatted error information provided by the server if available. The HTTP status code and provided message are used as a fallback when the server response does not contain a json error response.

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.CardServicesApiException
member.summary: Custom exception class used by to report errors processing server API requests. The property, when true, indicates that the exception represents an error response generated by the server business logic. When false, the exception was created from a HTTP status code.

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.CardServicesApiException.StatusCode
member.summary: Status code return from the server. The server uses a subset of the standard HTTP status to report servers (e.g. 200 = Success, 404 = Not Found, 500 = Internal Server, 406 endpoint selection error).

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.CardServicesApiException.IsServerError
member.summary: Flag indicating that the exception represents an error response generated by the server business logic

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.CardServicesApiException.#ctor(System.Net.HttpStatusCode,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Constructs and initializes the exception with the given HTTP statusCode code and error message.
member.param: True if is an API exception returned from the server

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi
member.summary: Server API class used to obtain information about the Consoles and Card Printers configured in the FARGO Connect platform.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.#ctor(RestSharp.RestClient)
member.summary: Internal constructor used to initialize the REST client API class.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.GetDevices(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries for the specified organization unique Id. An empty list is returned if no devices are found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.GetDevices
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries. An empty list is returned if no devices are found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.GetDevice(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified device Id. The device Id can be either the unique Id of a device or a valid print destination. A with a StatusCode of is thrown if the specified device is not found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.GetPrintDestinations
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries. An empty list is returned if no print destinations are found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.GetPrintDestinations(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries for the specified organization unique Id. An empty list is returned if no print destinations are found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi.GetDestinationPublicKey(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified destination Id. The destination Id can be either the unique Id of a device or a valid print destination. A with a StatusCode of is thrown if the requested certificate is not found.

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi
member.summary: Server API class used to submit and monitor card production requests.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi._deviceApi
member.summary: Device API used to request the device public key

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.#ctor(RestSharp.RestClient,FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.DeviceApi)
member.summary: Internal constructor used to initialize the REST client API class.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.GetJobsForTimePeriod(System.UInt32,System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries with a submit date within the specified time interval. Results are returned for the time period from the current time minus the timeSpan up to the current time (e.g. TimeSpan.FromHours(24) returns jobs from the last 24 hours). The maxResults parameter specifies the maximum number of results to return. The valid range for maxResults is 0 to 10000 inclusive.
member.param: Time interval for the job query
member.returns: List of jobs, empty list if none found
member.exception: if the timeSpan argument is null

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.GetJobsForDateRange(System.UInt32,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries with a submit date within the specified date range. Results are returned where the job submit date is greater than or equal to the start date and less than or equal to the end date. Care must be take when specifying the dates to avoid unexpected results due to time zone differences. The server sends dates and times in UTC and requires the client to provide accurate timezone information when submitting requests. The valid range for maxResults is 0 to 10000 inclusive.
member.param: Starting date for the job query
Ending date for the job query
member.returns: List of jobs, empty list if none found
member.exception: if the start date or end date are null
if the start date is after the end date

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.GetJob(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified unique Id. A with a StatusCode of is thrown if the specified job is not found.
member.exception: if jobUniqueId is null or blank

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.GetJobImageResource(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified job unique Id and resource key. A with a HTTP statusCode of 404 (Not Found) is thrown if the image resource is not found.
member.exception: if jobUniqueId or resourceKey is null or blank

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.SubmitProductionRequest(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.ProductionRequestTemplate)
member.summary: Submits the specified production request to the server for processing. On success, the method returns the job unique Id which can be used to retrieve job status information from the server.
member.exception: if request template argument is null

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.CreateJobUniqueId
member.summary: Requests a new job unique Id from the server

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.CreateProductionRequest(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.ProductionRequestTemplate,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Creates a production request archive from the supplied request template. The completed archive is return in the stream parameter passed to the method.
member.param: Empty stream to receive the completed request
member.exception: if requestTemplate or requestStream are null

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.GetImageFileExtension(System.IO.MemoryStream)
member.summary: Inspects the header bytes of the specified image stream and returns a file extension corresponding to the image type. Unrecognized images are mapped to a generic .dat extension.
member.param: Memory stream containing the image data

member.summary: Creates the XML card request document for the production request

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.CreateServiceParams(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.ProductionRequestTemplate)
member.summary: Creates the serviceParams element for the card request. An empty element is returned if no profile parameters are defined.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.CreateServiceOptions(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRequestService)
member.summary: Creates the serviceOptions element for the card request. An empty element is returned if not options are defined

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.CreateRequestParameters(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRequestService,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Creates the encrypted secureData element for the card request. An empty requestParams element is returned if no data parameters are defined

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.ParseCertificate(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.PublicKeyCertificate)
member.summary: Internal method used to parse a destination certificate and extract its public key. The certificate data stored in the parameter must be a certificate in PEM format.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.CreateDataCipher(FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.PublicKeyCertificate,System.String@)
member.summary: Internal method used to create symmetric cipher used for data encrypted and to encrypt the associated symmetric key using RSA encryption. The RSA encryption is performed using the supplied certificate belonging to the destination device where the job will be decrypted and printed.
member.param: Output parameter returning the RSA encrypted key

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.EncryptStream(System.IO.MemoryStream,System.IO.Stream,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the contents of the specified input stream using the specified cipher. The resulting encrypted cipher text in Base64 format is prefixed by the encrypted key string and is written to the output stream.
member.param: Input strea of data to encrypt

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.JobApi.EncryptString(System.String,System.Security.Cryptography.SymmetricAlgorithm,System.String)
member.summary: Encrypts the specified data string and returns the resulting cipher text in Base64 format is prefixed by the encrypted key string and is returned as the method result.
member.returns: Encrypted key + data in base64 format

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi

member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries. An empty list is returned if no organizations are found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi.GetOrganization(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified unique Id. A with a StatusCode of is thrown if the specified organization is not found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi.GetOrganizationalUnits(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries for the organization with the specified unique Id. An empty list is returned if no organizational units are found for the organization.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi.GetOrganizationalUnit(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified organizational unit unique Id. A with a StatusCode of is thrown if the specified organizational unit is not found.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi.GetOrganizationLocations(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries across all organizational units belonging to the organization with specified unique Id. An empty list is returned if no locations are found for the organization.
member.returns: List of locations for the organization

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi.GetOrganizationalUnitLocations(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the list of available entries for the organizational unit with specified unique Id. An empty list is returned if no locations are found for the organizational unit.
member.returns: List of locations for the organizational unit

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Client.OrganizationApi.GetLocation(System.String)
member.summary: Queries the server for the matching the specified location unique Id. A with a StatusCode of is thrown if the specified location is not found.

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData
member.summary: Class containing the data returned by the Card Read Service for a card edge. The enabled value indicates whether the card edge was enabled in the service configuration.The status value indicates the overall disposition of the card edge read results. Note that the same card edge, as indicated by the edgeType value, may occur more than once for card edge technologies such as HID iCLASS that support multiple card protocols.

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.EdgeType
member.summary: Name of the card edge type. The supported card edge type names are defined by constants in .

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.Enabled
member.summary: Flag indicating whether the card edge was enabled in the card read service configuration.

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.Status
member.summary: Card edge read status. The status value indicates if the card edge is enabled and whether the read operation succeeded.

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.StatusMessage
member.summary: Message describing the read status

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.CardProtocol
member.summary: Card protocol used to discover the card edge

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.CardSerialNumber
member.summary: Card serial number, empty string if none

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.PacsDataAvailable
member.summary: True if PACS data was read from the card edge

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.CardPacsBitData
member.summary: PACS data for the card edge in hex format, empty string if none

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.CardPacsBitCount
member.summary: Width of the PACS data in bits, 0 if PACS data is unavailable

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.PacsData
member.summary: Decoded PACS data obtained by applying the configured card formats to the CardPacsBitData field. Each entry in the list corresponds to an individual card format.

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.Data
member.summary: Dictionary containing additional card edge read results in the form of key/value pairs.

member.name: M:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeData.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor used to initialize collections

member.summary: Enumeration indicating the status of the read results for a card edge.

member.summary: Card edge is disabled

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeStatus.Success
member.summary: Card edge read succeeded

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeStatus.NotFound
member.summary: Requested card edge was not found

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.CardEdgeStatus.Failed
member.summary: Card edge read failed

member.summary: Class containing results data from the card read service

member.summary: List containing the configured card edges and associated results data returned by the card read service.

member.summary: Default constructor used to initialize collections

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults
member.summary: Class containing PACS data obtained by decoding the card PACS bits using a configured card format.

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults.FormatName
member.summary: Name of the card format used to decode the PACS bits

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults.FormatBitCount
member.summary: Card format PACS bit count, 0 if unknown

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults.DecodeStatus
member.summary: PACS decode status indicating the outcome of the PACS decode process

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults.StatusMessage
member.summary: Message describing the outcome of the PACS decode process

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults.CardNumber
member.summary: Card number extracted from the card PACS bits. The card number is a mandatory field and is always present if the PACS decode process was successful. The card number is also present in the PacsFields dictionary

member.name: P:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeResults.PacsFields
member.summary: Dictionary containing the values extracted from the card PACS bit data. The available fields and their names are controlled by the card format and may vary across card formats.

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus
member.summary: Enumeration indicating the outcome of the PACS bits decode process.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus.Success
member.summary: PACS bits decoded successfully

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus.ParityError
member.summary: PACS bits decoded, but parity check failed

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus.PacsDecodeFailed
member.summary: PACS bits decode failed. See StatusMessage for details

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus.FormatNotFound
member.summary: PACS format not found or inaccessible due to server security constraints.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus.FormatOpenFailed
member.summary: Error opening the PACS format

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.CardRead.PacsDecodeStatus.FormatMismatch
member.summary: PACS format and PACS bits are incompatible

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption
member.summary: Class defining constants for configuring card image rendering options in the dictionary in card production requests. The card image rendering service generates and returns an image of the information printed on the front and/or back of the printed card.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.Enable
member.summary: Service parameter used to enable card image rendering. Supported values are "true" and "false". The default setting is "false".

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.OutputMode
member.summary: Service parameter used to specify the output mode when card image rendering is enabled. Supported values are and The default setting is

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.CardSides
member.summary: Service parameter used to configure the card sides to be rendered. Supported values are , and . The default setting is .

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.ImageRotation
member.summary: Service parameter used to control the orientation of the rendered card image. Supported image rotation values are , , and . The default setting is .

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.ImageQuality
member.summary: Service parameter used to configure the image quality setting of the rendering process. The value must be a valid floating point number between "0.0" and "1.0". The default setting is "0.8".

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.RenderAndPrint
member.summary: value that configures the service to render the card image and print a physical card. The card image is returned once the card printing process has completed.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.RenderOnly
member.summary: value that configures the service to only render the card image. The job completes with a status of "Printed", but a physical card is not printed.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.FrontOnly
member.summary: value that configures the service to render the card front.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.BackOnly
member.summary: value that configures the service to render the card back.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.FrontAndBack
member.summary: value that configures the service to render the card front and back.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.NoRotation
member.summary: value that disables rotation of the card image

member.summary: value that rotates the image clockwise 90 degrees

member.summary: value that rotates the image clockwise 180 degrees

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.CardRenderOption.Clockwise270
member.summary: value that rotates the image clockwise 270 degrees

member.name: T:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.PrinterOption
member.summary: Class defining constants for configuring printer options in the dictionary map in card production requests.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.PrinterOption.InputHopperSelect
member.summary: Service parameter used to configure the card printer input hopper selection.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.PrinterOption.UseFirstAvailable
member.summary: InputHopperSelect value to configure the printer to use the first available input hopper. This is the default selection.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.PrinterOption.UseHopper1
member.summary: InputHopperSelect value to configure the printer to use input Hopper 1.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.PrinterOption.UseHopper2
member.summary: InputHopperSelect value to configure the printer to use input Hopper 2. This option has no effect if the printer does not have a second input hopper.

member.name: F:FargoConnect.CardServices.RestApi.Model.Service.PrinterOption.UseExceptionFeed
member.summary: InputHopperSelect value to configure the printer to use the printer exception card slot. This option has no effect if the printer does not have an exception slot.
